PackageOracle.name: DA_TICKET_CANCEL
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_TICKET_CANCEL
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.22.412252000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,code_sequence_num IN NUMBER
,ticket_interaction_id IN NUMBER
,ticket_cancel_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,ticket_interaction_id IN NUMBER
,ticket_cancel_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_ticket_cancel;

body.name: DA_TICKET_CANCEL
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_TICKET_CANCEL
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.22.433767000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,code_sequence_num IN NUMBER
,ticket_interaction_id IN NUMBER
,ticket_cancel_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_ticket_cancel.add, parms=' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || code_sequence_num || '|' || ticket_interaction_id || '|' || ticket_cancel_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_ticket_cancel a
(
a.data_source_type_cd
,a.code_sequence_num
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
,a.ticket_interaction_id
,a.ticket_cancel_cd
)
VALUES
(
add.data_source_type_cd
,add.code_sequence_num
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
,add.ticket_interaction_id
,add.ticket_cancel_cd
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_ticket_cancel.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,ticket_interaction_id IN NUMBER
,ticket_cancel_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_ticket_cancel.del, parms=' || ticket_interaction_id || '|' || ticket_cancel_cd || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_ticket_cancel a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.ticket_interaction_id = del.ticket_interaction_id
AND a.ticket_cancel_cd = del.ticket_cancel_cd
AND a.data_source_type_cd = del.data_source_type_cd
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_ticket_cancel.del');

END del;

END da_ticket_cancel;
